attributes.name: script
script
script
script
attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-inhome-f2.InHome_4:'
var sections = {
'ENV':[],
'HCU1':[
'HCU_HLOVRNT_COF2',
'HCU_NRSHM_COF2',
'HCU_HAVEFAM_COF2',
'HCU_NOFAM_COF2',
'HCU_FAMV_COF2',
'HCU_SPEV_COF2'],
'INT':[
'INT_ACCESSHM_COF2',
'INT_FRQEMAIL_COF2',
'INT_FRQWBSTS_COF2',
'INT_FRQHLTH_COF2',
'INT_SCLNTWRK_COF2',
'INT_WYSSCL_COF2',
'INT_FRQMNF_COF2',
'INT_FRQFRI_COF2',
'INT_FRQFAM_COF2',
'INT_FRQPRO_COF2',
'INT_FRQOT_COF2'],
'K10':[
'K10_TIRED_COF2',
'K10_NRVS_COF2',
'K10_NRVSCLMD_COF2',
'K10_HPLS_COF2',
'K10_RSTLS_COF2',
'K10_RSTLSSTL_COF2',
'K10_DEP_COF2',
'K10_EFFRT_COF2',
'K10_NOCHRUP_COF2',
'K10_WRTHLSS_COF2'],
'MEM':[
'MEM_PAYBILL_COF2',
'MEM_MPLAC_COF2',
'MEM_RMNUM_COF2',
'MEM_RCNME_COF2',
'MEM_LVTHG_COF2',
'MEM_FGAPT_COF2',
'MEM_FGTDO_COF2',
'MEM_FGERD_COF2',
'MEM_SPWRD_COF2',
'MEM_MBDTL_COF2',
'MEM_FGMED_COF2',
'MEM_NAMEK_COF2',
'MEM_PSMEG_COF2',
'MEM_FGSAY_COF2',
'MEM_FGANV_COF2',
'MEM_TELNM_COF2',
'MEM_RETELL_COF2',
'MEM_PLAWY_COF2',
'MEM_BUYTH_COF2',
'MEM_DTCNV_COF2'],
'MET':[
'MET_NEED_COF2',
'CR1_PRO_COF2'],
'PMH':[
'PMH_2 PMH_HAPPY_ COF2',
'PMH_3 PMH_INTERST_ COF2',
'PMH_4 PMH_SATISFIED_ COF2',
'PMH_5 PMH_IMPORTANT_COF2',
'PMH_6 PMH_COMMUNT_ COF2',
'PMH_7 PMH_GOODPL_ COF2',
'PMH_8 PMH_PPLGOOD_ COF2',
'PMH_9 PMH_SOCIETYWRK_COF2',
'PMH_10 PMH_LIKEYOU_ COF2',
'PMH_11 PMH_MANAGE_ COF2',
'PMH_12 PMH_RELATIONSHP_COF2',
'PMH_13 PMH_BETTER_ COF2',
'PMH_14 PMH_CONFIDENT_COF2',
'PMH_15 PMH_DIRECTION_COF2'],
'TRA':[
'TRA_DSTATUS_COF2',
'TRA_STATUSCHK_COF2',
'TRA_DFREQ_COF2',
'TRA_CMNTR1_COF2',
'TRA_CMNTR2_COF2',
'TRA_TYPTR_COF2',
'TRA_PUBTR_COF2',
'TRA_ACCTR_COF2',
'TRA_PUBTRFRQ_COF2',
'TRA_TRIP_COF2',
'TRA_AVOID_COF2',
'TRA_DRVST1_YR_COF2',
'TRA_CEASE_COF2',
'TRA_MED_COF2',
'TRA_MEDTPC_COF2',
'TRA_ACCID_COF2'],
'WEA':[
'WEA_SVNGS_COF2',
'WEA_SVNGSVL_COF2',
'WEA_LFINS_COF2',
'WEA_ASSETS_COF2',
'WEA_DEBT_COF2',
'WEA_FNSTATUS_COF2',
'WEA_INCNEEDS_COF2',
'WEA_THNGS_COF2',
'WEA_ORGMONEY_COF2',
'WEA_FNDEC_COF2',
'WEA_SUFFUND_COF2',
'WEA_INHERT_COF2']
}

var skip = []
if($(stage+'QuestionnaireRun.version').any('5.0','5.1').value()) {
  skip.push('PMH')
  skip.push('WTP')
}

var str = []
for(var key in sections) {
  if(-1 != skip.indexOf(key)) {
    str.push(null)
    continue
  }
  var rcount = 0
  var qcount = 0
  var arr = sections[key]
  for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    var j = $(stage + arr[i])
    if(j.isNull().value()) {
      continue
    }  
    qcount++
    rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0
  }
  if(0 == qcount) {
    str.push(null)
  } else {
    str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount)
  }
}
newSequence(str, 'decimal')

attributes.name: script
script
